pivot_uid.description: The unique identifier (UID) of the business

external_review_site_url.description: Specifies the external review site URL where the review will be shared.

external_review_site_display_name.description: Specifies the display name of the external review site receiving the review.

display_review_checkbox_cp.description: Enables the client to decide whether their review is shared with that external review site.

platform_url_business_params.description:
Defines which external review platform is selected (via platform_id, where 1=Google, 2=Facebook) and includes the required platform - unique identifier ('place_id' for Google,'yourbusiness' for Facebook) needed to properly route the review. 
Each platform requires different parameter structures based on their unique requirements.
